Durable & Stylish Residential Epoxy Floors

Premium epoxy flooring solutions for your garage, basement, and living areas

Scroll

Upgrade your home's flooring with Maco Painting's professional epoxy floor services. Our high-performance epoxy coatings transform garages, basements, and other residential spaces with durable, low-maintenance finishes that resist stains, impacts, and heavy foot traffic, making them ideal for high-use areas.

Why Choose Epoxy Floors for Your Home?

  • Superior Durability: Epoxy floors resist stains, impacts, and heavy foot traffic, making them ideal for high-use areas like garages and basements.
  • Seamless Surface Protection: Our seamless coatings create a protective barrier that guards against moisture, chemicals, and daily wear.
  • Customization Options: Choose from a variety of finishes, including high-gloss, matte, and decorative flakes, to enhance your space.
  • Easy Maintenance: Simply sweep and occasionally mop to keep your epoxy floors looking pristine for years.

Our Residential Epoxy Floor Services

Garage Floor Epoxy

Protect and enhance your garage floor with a durable epoxy coating that resists oil stains, chemicals, and abrasions. Our garage epoxy solutions provide strong, long-lasting protection with slip-resistant options available for added safety.

Basement Epoxy Coatings

Transform your basement into a clean, modern space with epoxy coatings that prevent moisture infiltration and resist wear. Epoxy basement floors offer moisture and mold resistance, stylish finish options, and increased home value.

Decorative Finishes for Home Spaces

Add a touch of elegance and personality to your living areas with decorative epoxy finishes that combine beauty and function. Our decorative epoxy solutions offer custom colors and patterns, high-gloss or matte finishes, and enhanced aesthetic appeal.

Our Proven Epoxy Floor Application Process

  1. Consultation & Customization: We discuss your needs and preferences, offering personalized design options to match your style.
  2. Surface Preparation: Our team thoroughly cleans and grinds the surface for maximum adhesion and durability.
  3. Epoxy Application: We apply multiple coats of high-quality epoxy for strength and longevity.
  4. Sealing & Finishing: A protective topcoat ensures long-lasting performance and easy maintenance.

Stunning Design Options

Solid Colors & Flake Systems

Choose from clean, uniform solid colors or multi-colored flake systems that offer a terrazzo-like appearance for visual interest and slip resistance.

Metallic Finishes

Create stunning dimensional, high-gloss surfaces with unique movement and depth using our premium metallic epoxy finishes.

Marbled Patterns & Custom Designs

Express your unique style with elegant, one-of-a-kind swirls and marbled designs that transform ordinary concrete into extraordinary surfaces.

Specialty Designs & Artistic Expressions

For truly unique spaces, our artistic epoxy applications can incorporate multiple colors, techniques, and effects to create a completely custom look that complements any room in your home.

Ready to Transform Your Floors?

Experience the Maco Painting difference with our premium epoxy floor services.
